sinks.name: TEE_Free
sinks.reason: Missing input validation could lead to undefined behavior if a tainted pointer is passed.

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Unencrypted output to Normal World if randomBuffer is shared

sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Missing input validation on size parameter could lead to buffer overflows or memory corruption if tainted data is used.
